identity.name: Sentinel
identity.description: A military-grade cybersecurity interface for the post-cloud era. It fuses high-fidelity 3D visualization with dense, actionable data.

usage.headings: Rajdhani (SemiBold/Bold), tracking-tight, uppercase for major sections

rules: NEVER use pure white backgrounds. Use #050505 or #0a0a0a.
Gradients should be used for glows/lighting, not solid fills.

containers.glass_panel: bg-black/40 backdrop-blur-xl border border-white/10 shadow-2xl rounded-sm

buttons.primary: bg-neon-blue/10 text-neon-blue border border-neon-blue/50 hover:bg-neon-blue/20 hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(0,243,255,0.3)] transition-all uppercase tracking-widest font-rajdhani
buttons.destructive: bg-neon-red/10 text-neon-red border border-neon-red/50 hover:bg-neon-red/20 hover:shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(255,0,60,0.3)] transition-all uppercase tracking-widest font-rajdhani
buttons.outline: bg-transparent border border-white/20 text-white/70 hover:border-white/50 hover:text-white transition-all

cards.implementation: bg-black/60 backdrop-blur-md border border-white/10 relative overflow-hidden group

inputs.style: bg-black/50 border-white/20 focus:border-neon-blue focus:ring-1 focus:ring-neon-blue/50 text-white placeholder:text-white/30 font-mono

effects: Scanlines: overlay a subtle repeating linear gradient for a CRT monitor feel
Glow: Use drop-shadow or box-shadow with color to simulate light emission
Grid Lines: Subtle background grid to anchor elements

elements.nodes: Icosahedrons or Octahedrons (Wireframe or Glowing Material)

steps: 1. Setup Tailwind config with neon colors and font families.
3. Build the R3F Canvas background with a basic rotating mesh to test performance.
4. Implement the Bento Grid layout for the main dashboard (HUD layer).
6. Connect WebSocket mock data to drive the 3D visualization and charts.
7. Refine the 'Attack' visual mode (camera shake, red bloom).

asset_urls.icons: Use 'lucide-react' for all UI icons (Shield, Activity, Server, Zap, Globe, AlertTriangle).

universal_guidelines: Theme: DEFAULT TO DARK MODE. There is no light mode.
Data-TestID: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements.
Accessibility: Ensure text contrast > 4.5:1. Neon colors are for accents/borders, not body text.
Performance: Use 'instancedMesh' for particles. Avoid heavy post-processing on the entire screen if FPS drops.
State: Use 'zustand' for global state (attack status, node health).
